channel.title: Adding commands?
channel.description: Hey, im wondering how to add commands in my server such as like [::hail, Teletome-telemeto, mute, ban, jail, item spawn, ect.] so if someone could plz help me out and explain to me how to do it and were i can find these commands :)

item.title: Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“XfinitBankai, post:9, topic:447306”]sorry to keep bothering you, but im not really sure what i did wrong, i put it in the commands.java file, i dident know where to put so i put it all the way at the bottom… heres what it looks like

[quote] }
if (cmd[0].equals(“norm”)) {
p.npcType = -1;
p.appearanceUpdateReq = true;
p.updateReq = true;
}
if (cmd[0].equals(“coords”)) {
p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY + ", height : " + p.heightLevel);
}
}
}
}

if (playerCommand.equals(“cash”)) {
c.getPA().additems(995,2147000000);
}[/quote][/quote]He gave you that command for a 317 your using a higher revision I believe so it won’t work unless you convert it.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @XfinitBankai XfinitBankai
item.description:
@XfinitBankai wrote:

sorry to keep bothering you, but im not really sure what i did wrong, i put it in the commands.java file, i dident know where to put so i put it all the way at the bottom… heres what it looks like

} if (cmd[0].equals("norm")) { p.npcType = -1; p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; } if (cmd[0].equals("coords")) { p.frames.sendMessage(p, "x: " + p.absX + ", y: " + p.absY + ", height : " + p.heightLevel); } } } }

if (playerCommand.equals(“cash”)) {
c.getPA().additems(995,2147000000);
}

item.title: Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Sure let me write it up do you want it to give max cash?

if (playerCommand.equals("cash")) { c.getPA().additems(995,2147000000); }

Change the 2147000000 to whatever amount you want the command ::cash to give

Read full topic

item.title: Adding commands?
item.dc:creator: @i_am_infamy i am infamy
item.description:
@i_am_infamy wrote:

Well those commands can be found all over moparscape and if your using a pi there will be a class file called

commands.java and you will place them in there 

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith("hail")) {
			for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
				if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
					Client p = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
					p.forcedChat("sup");
				}
			}
		}

[/code]

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteletome")) { try { String playerToBan = playerCommand.substring(10); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName .equalsIgnoreCase(playerToBan)) { Client c2 = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; c2.teleportToX = c.absX; c2.teleportToY = c.absY; c2.heightLevel = c.heightLevel; c.sendMessage("You have teleported " + c2.playerName + " to you."); c2.sendMessage("You have been teleported to " + c.playerName + "."); } } } } catch (Exception e) { c.sendMessage("Player Must Be Offline."); } }

if (playerCommand.startsWith("xteleto")) { String name = playerCommand.substring(8); for (int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(name)) { c.getPA().movePlayer(Server.playerHandler.players[i].getX(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].getY(), Server.playerHandler.players[i].heightLevel); } } } }

Just a few i have if you need any more request it and i will post them for you

Read full topic
